functions.tag: {CustomModelData:17,EntityTag:{Tags:[Sign,Birch],Silent:1b,Size:0b,DeathLootTable:"item:item/magma_cube_spawn_egg/sign/sheep_spawner",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,tag:{Data:{Text1:'{"translate":"羊スポナー","color":"white","bold":true}',Text4:'{"text":"⑰","font":"sign","color":"white","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"function item:sign/click/sheep_spawner"}}}'}}},{},{},{}]},display:{Name:'{"translate":"羊スポナーの印板","color":"#FFFFFF","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"設置してクリックすると","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"%1$sがスポーンしない","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"幻の羊毛","color":"#FF00B3"}]}','{"translate":"%1$s羊スポナーを設置される。","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"通常タイプの","color":"#FFC300"}]}','{"translate":"【注意】スポナーには直接設置できません！","color":"#FF0000","bold":true,"italic":false}']}}
